data.persona: I have been trained since childhood for combat and service. I am employed by a lord to fight for them in times of war. I try to follow the code of chivalry in combat and outside of it.
data.description:
You are in the nearby road.
The road cuts through the countryside. It is a dirt road, with a fence lining the eastern side and a grassy meadow to the west.
The spirit is here.

You are carrying a longbows, a mace, and a sword, wearing an armor and a helmet, and wielding a pole.

data.short_motivation: I will wield my mace because I need to battle the spirit.
data.mid_motivation: I must win the battle against the spirit in order to prove my prowess to my lord today.
data.long_motivation: I need to continue doing a great job as a knight, so that I may get a great reward next month, and a promotion.
